dc_title_s: Sex Offender Restricted Area (Dissolved): Linn County, Iowa
dc_description_s: This feature layer contains Linn County registered sex offender restricted areas dissolved by restriction type. This information is automatically generated once a week based on the following criteria:Restricted Living Areas are those areas within 2,000 ft of parcels containing the following features:SchoolsDaycaresRestricted Loitering Areas are those areas within 300 ft of parcels containing the following features:SchoolsDaycaresParksLibrariesFeature Layer DetailsUpdate Frequency: Once a weekFeature Class Coordinate System: NAD 1983 (2011) Iowa North State Plane (wkid: 6463)Max Visibility Scale: NoneMin Visibility Scale: 1:288,895Max Features Returned: 5,000Additional ResourcesVisit Linn County, Iowa on the web.Visit Linn County, Iowa GIS on the web.Visit the Linn County, Iowa GIS portal. This site is updated as needed to reflect maps and apps of interest from various departments.Visit the State of Iowa Sex Offender Registry for more information specific to the State sex offender list. Linn County does NOT maintain this information.Contact InformationQuestions Contact the GIS Division by phone at 319.892.5250 or by email.
